thread.title: Cobalt Power To Acquire Significant Cobalt Assets In Cobalt Mining Camp

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Cobalt Power To Acquire Significant Cobalt Assets In Cobalt Mining Camp

organizations.name: cobalt power to acquire significant cobalt assets in cobalt mining camp

text:
Feb 13 (Reuters) - Cobalt Power Group Inc:
* COBALT POWER GROUP TO ACQUIRE SIGNIFICANT COBALT ASSETS IN THE COBALT MINING CAMP, ONTARIO
* COBALT POWER - ACQUIRING ISSUED AND OUTSTANDING SHARES OF ONTARIO COBALT IN EXCHANGE FOR 15 MILLION SHARES OF CO TO SHAREHOLDERS OF ONTARIO COBALT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
